pasikuda siddhiya pasubim kara ganimin madhya mangin asathya prachara gena yame aramuna pawathina aanduwa adapana kirima bawa shri lanka nidahas pakshaye maha lekam, saukhya amathi maithripala sirisena mahatha pawasayi.pasikuda siddhiyedi thamage putha yam waradak kara thibe nam idiriyedi ganna nithimaya kriyamargawalata kisima balapamak nokarana bawa da amathiwaraya pawasuweya.

sowiyat - uthuru koriyan sabandathawayedi hamudamaya washayen boho aadhara labuna athara pasuwa 1950 juni 25 wanada sidu keruna dakunu koriyawa aakramanayada sowiyata nayaka stalinge anumathiya illa eya labuna pasu sidu kirimen saha mema sangrama awadhiyeda sowiyata aadhara ha upades itha bagapathwa illamin sidukirimenma eda sowiyat deshaye balapam shakthiya pilibadawa amuthuwen kiwayuthu nowe. 1950 juni 25 wanada uthuru koriyawa wisin 38 wana akshansa rekhawa pana dakunu koriyawa aakramanaya karanu labuwe kisidu pera danumdimakin nowu athara in wasarakata pera china wiplawayata pawa sambandhawa china mahajana wimukthi hamudawe pawa satan kara hoda palapuruddakwa thibu atham uthuru koriyanu jyeshta soldaduwanta, yantham wasara thunaka hamuda puhunuwak ha thama ratema siwil wasiyan mardhanaya karamin pamanak siti dakunu koriyanu hamudawa madapawathwima etharam deyak nowiya.
eya ‘sinemaya’ sinama sangarawe (1988 – 2004 kalapa eke sita 62 dakwa) palamu lipiwala ekathuwak.

buddhashasana amathyanshaya - thirasara dahami samajayak udesa punyagrama wadasatahana garu niyojya amathya thuma niladharin bauddha katayuthu pilibanda departhamenthuwa bauddha wishwakoshaya nawya puwath baganim thirasara dahami samajayak udesa punyagrama wadasatahana gamayi pansalayi athara sambandhathawaya shakthimath karamin thirasara dahami samajayak godanagima aramunu karaganimin buddhashasana amathyanshaya magin kriyathmaka karanu labana punyagrama wadasatahane thawath ek wadasatahanak lesa puththalama disthrikkaye halawatha pradeshiya lekam bala pradeshaye wirapandiyana gramaniladhari kottashaye sippikalana shri wajiragnyanarama wiharasthanaya kendrakota ganimin 40k namak wu maha sanghayawahansege sahabhagithwayen mulu gammanayama aawaranaya wana paridi pindapatha charika pinkamak 2018 aprel masa 09 wana dina pawathwana ladi.
